articles.title: Al Hilal become only the third Asian team to reach FIFA Club World Cup final -- so who did it before them? - ESPN
articles.description: Al Hilal have become only the third Asian team to ever reach the FIFA Club World Cup final, but who are the two that have done it before them?
articles.content:
With a thrilling 3-2 semifinal win over Flamengo on Tuesday evening, Al Hilal booked their place in the FIFA Club World Cup decider.
